Class BatchProcessor<T,R>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.performance.BatchProcessor<T,R>
public class BatchProcessor<T,R> extends Object
Batch Task Processor for efficient small task handling. Groups small tasks together to reduce overhead. Features: - Configurable batch size and timeout - Async batch processing - Batch result distribution

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Create batch processor with custom settings.
    BatchProcessor(Function<List<T>,List<R>> batchHandler)
    Create batch processor with defaults (100 items, 100ms timeout).
